4307140.name: HYPHAE
4307140.description:
HYPHAE is a rogue like tower defense game. Place down tiles to reveal fog, and locate the artifact. Beware of enemies lurking behind the fog, and watch out for rifts!

How far can you stretch your network? Can you find all the artifacts? Will you defeat all enemies who wishes you to be gone?

Network Growing

Place down tetris-like shapes to grow your network. Consume resources, uncover fog, but most importantly: Locate and extract artifacts. But beware, within each artifact lies an ancient power.

The further away from your core you reach, the stronger enemies. Keep that in mind, as you strategically place down tiles!

Defend against a variety of enemies!

Strategically place down towers to defend against critters, be especially aware of rifts on the ground! Can you unlock all the special towers?

Artifact Bosses

Uncovering artifacts will awaken powerful bosses. Can you defeat them all?

The longer you live on this planet, the more you will adapt. Introducing: The adaption upgrades:

Adapt and Evolve

Gain powerful boons that will aid you in growing your network and in combat
4307140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
